data.title: Online Verdict
data.text:
By completing the following form, you are adding yourself to our database. When an opportunity is scheduled in your area, we will contact you either via email, text, and/or phone. It is 100% optional to participate. We do not sell or share your contact information and will only contact you when an opportunity is posted.

"*" indicates required fields

First Name*

Last Name*

Email*

Address*

Street Address Address Line 2 City ZIP Code

State*

County*

If the State and County fields doesn’t load, double-check your internet connection and refresh the page.

Cell Phone*

Landline

Are you a US citizen?*

Yes

No

Do you have a current valid driver's license or State ID?*

Yes

No

Are you a registered voter?*

Yes

No

Ethnic Background*

White/Caucasian

Black/African American

Hispanic/Latino/Latina

Asian-American

Native American/Other

Gender*

Male

Female

Transsexual

Non-Binary

Other

Marital Status*

Never Married

Married

Separated

Divorced

Widowed

Living with Partner/Significant Other

Employment Status*

Employed

Self Employed

Homemaker

Retired

Student

Disabled

Unemployed/Other

How would you characterize your occupation?*

Blue Collar

Clerical

Sales

Service

Professional

White Collar

Student

Homemaker

Other

Annual Household Income*

Less than $25,000

$25,000 – $50,000

$50,000 – $75,000

$75,000 – $100,000

$100,000 – $150,000

$150,000 +

Highest Level of Education*

Less than High School

High School Graduate or GED

Some College/No Associate’s Degree

Some College/Vocation/Technical School Completion

Junior College/Associate’s Degree

College Degree/Bachelor’s Degree

Some Graduate Study

Graduate/Professional Degree

Political Stance*

Very Liberal

Somewhat Liberal

Middle of the Road

Somewhat Conservative

Very Conservative

Consent*

By checking this box, I am attaching my electronic signature to and agreeing to the Site Usage Agreement for the OnlineVerdict.com Website and services, and to the OnlineVerdict.com Privacy Policy. I understand that if I do not agree to these Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy, I should not check this box, discontinue submission of my personal information, and refrain from using the OnlineVerdict.com Website and service.*

Confidentiality*

I agree to keep confidential the facts and names of all of the parties in cases on which I serve as an OnlineVerdict.com juror.*

Name

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
